Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Instrumentation for Clinical Multiplex Test Systems
Specimen Type(s): Nasal swab eluted in viral transport media
Nasopharyngeal swab eluted in viral transport media
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ID NOW Influenza A & B 2 rapid molecular test using isothermal amplification for qualitative detection of influenza A and B viral RNA
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid molecular in vitro diagnostic test for qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza A and B viral RNA in direct or eluted nasal/nasopharyngeal swabs from symptomatic patients, aiding differential diagnosis in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological risk factors.
